entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trying to leave the house, but Uncle Vernon is blocking his way. Harry has a wand and threatens to jinx Uncle Vernon if he doesn't move.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is yelling at Harry and trying to block his way out of the house. He knows that Harry's wand is not allowed outside of Hogwarts.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia screams when Uncle Vernon ducks due to a loud noise in the kitchen.

entities.name: harry's school
entities.description: Harry mentions that he has been expelled from Hogwarts, which is referred to as a 'madhouse' by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: barn owl
entities.description: A barn owl collides with the kitchen window and causes a disturbance.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to leave the house, but Uncle Vernon is blocking his way.
Aunt Petunia screams when Uncle Vernon ducks due to a loud noise in the kitchen.
Uncle Vernon refers to Hogwarts as a 'madhouse' and is disapproving of Harry's behavior.
